price: 2. (Alle) waa Kan idinka abuuray dhoobo, markaas (idiin) qaddaray muddo (aad ku dhimataan), waxaana jira muddo (kale oo) magaacaban (Saacadda Qiyaame) uu Isagu (Alle keliya) Og yahay, idinkuse (gaaloy) waad ka shakisan tihiin oo ka dooddaan.
arabic: هُوَ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَكُم مِّن طِينٖ ثُمَّ قَضَىٰٓ أَجَلٗاۖ وَأَجَلٞ مُّسَمًّى عِندَهُۥۖ ثُمَّ أَنتُمۡ تَمۡتَرُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: huwa alladhī khalaqakum min ṭīnin thumma qaḍā ajalan wa-ajalun musamman ʿindahu thumma antum tamtarūna
